rank: #3 in Best Liberal Arts Colleges in America
description:
editorial
Claremont McKenna is a highly rated private college located in Claremont, California in the Los Angeles Area. It is a small institution with an enrollment of 1,380 undergraduate students. Admissions is extremely competitive as the Claremont McKenna acceptance rate is 10%. Popular majors include Economics, Political Science and Government, and Liberal Arts and Humanities. Graduating 91% of students, Claremont McKenna alumni go on to earn a starting salary of $55,900.
